p: The medium containing peptone 10.0 g/L, NaCl 5.0 g/L, CaCl2.2H2O 0.1 g/L, agar 18.0 g/L, pH 7.0 was prepared for determining esterase activity. To the sterilized culture medium, previously sterilized Tween 80 (1% (v/v) was added. Endophytic bacterial isolates, E. coli (ATCC 25922) (negative control) and Bacillus cereus (ATCC 10102) (positive control) were separately pipetted onto the medium and incubated at 28 °C for 5 days. After incubation period, the appearance of a well visible halo around the colonies was indicative of the esterase production [ 29].
